review: Hi I am Ashwin  I  started taking dicorate 250mg from Sep of 2021 and my cyclothymic disorder got stabilised very quickly.  I can't believe it or not this medicine has changed my life.

I am taking a low dose of 500 mg twice. I'm tapering off lithium (300mg for a few more days), so I am not sure how it is stand alone. Lithium did nothing for me, but this drug makes me calmer, sleep better and my anger issues are subsided. I am sad I cannot take a sip of alcohol as an internet search scared the bejesus out of me. DO not drink with this drug!

I took depakote two different times, once in 2016 and in 2017. The 5 months I took it in 2016 I noticed I had less ocd and insomnia. My hair got thinner but not so badly and also I felt like I couldn't do activities that requested an intellectual effort.The seconde time I took it for a period of about two months I didn't feel like it slowed me down like the first time, but my hair lost was worse and it made me very hungry. I discontinued it because the hair lost was too much. However it still helped with my ocd and calmness.
